archetypes.name: Radiant Rebel
archetypes.description: You are the spark who shakes things up — a fire with a heartbeat, designed to disrupt what's false and awaken what's real.

archetypes.name: Playful Creator
archetypes.description: The creator who brings joy to life — you are the color that moves, a spark dressed in creativity.

archetypes.name: Sacred Jester
archetypes.description: You are the one who reveals truth with humor and helps others feel safe being real.

archetypes.name: Wild Alchemist
archetypes.description: You are the alchemist who gives pain purpose — helping people rebirth themselves.

archetypes.name: Heart Holder
archetypes.description: You are the quiet gravity — co-regulating rooms and the heartbeat that steadies the storm.

archetypes.name: Cosmic Connector
archetypes.description: You are the thread between worlds — weaving the mystical into the practical, the unseen into form.

archetypes.name: Compassionate Leader
archetypes.description: You are the compass in chaos — you make people feel seen, safe, and ready to rise.

archetypes.name: Truth-Teller
archetypes.description: You are the sentence that slices through the noise — speaking sharp truth wrapped in unexpected tenderness.
